newsitem.title: EU: EP WOMEN'S RIGHTS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 29-30.
newsitem.headline: EP WOMEN'S RIGHTS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 29-30.

text.p: Committee on Women's Rights [[ Tuesday 29 October 1996 ]] PUBLIC HEARING ON MAINSTREAMING AND THE STRUCTURAL FUNDS *********************PUBLIC MEETING********************* ===] Tuesday, 29 October 1996 0.2 PUBLIC HEARING ON MAINSTREAMING AND THE STRUCTURAL FUNDS - - Chairperson: Mrs Nel van DIJK - Rapporteur: Mrs Angela KOKKOLA ===] Invitees - Mr Padraig FLYNN, Commissioner responsible for Social Affairs - Mrs Monika WULF-MATHIES, Commissioner responsible for Regional Policy and Cohe sion - Mr Franz FISCHLER, Commissioner responsible for Agriculture and Rural Development ===] Experts - Mrs Candida MEDEIROS SOARES, Director General, Directorate-General for Employm ent and Professional Training, Portugal - Mrs Gisela MEHLMANN, Consultant for the Minister for Social Affairs, Family and Equal Opps in Brandenburg, Germany - Mrs Birgit FRIGGEBO, Chairperson of the Institutional Affairs Committee of the Swedish Parliament, Sweden - Mrs Teresa DOMINGO SEGARRA, Professor of Economics, Spain - Mrs Avila KILMURREY, Director, Northern Ireland Voluntary Trust, United Kingdo m 0.5 O-o-O-o-O ===] Wednesday, 30 October 1996 (morning) ===] Coordinators' meeting from 9.00 to 10.00 a.m. 0.9 - o-o-o-1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.532 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 9 September 1996 (PE218.987 ) - 17 September 1996 (PE218.988 ) - 1/2 October 1996 (PE218.991 ) 3. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure 4. Chairperson's announcements 5. Reports by Committee Members on the activities of other Committees of which they are Members ===] In the presence of the Commission 6. 1997 budget - Section III (T04556) (T04556) BUD0074 SEC(96)1677 C4-0515/96 + FEMM Avis A GRONER Lissy. (PSE) (PE217.394/DEF) F BUDG Fond R BRINKHORST Laurens J (ELD) (PE219.043 ) - Report on results of First Reading on those parts of the budget which the Ctte e on Women's Rights presented amendments 7. Equal treatment for men and women - social security schemes (amendment of Di rective 86/378 following Barber judgment) (T03741) (T03741) CNS95117 COM(95)0186 C4-0422/95 + FEMM Fond R TORRES MARQUES H. (PSE) - In the presence of the Legal Service of the European Parliament - Further debate pursuant to Rule 60(2) of the Rules of Procedure on compromise amendments 8. Situation of the wives of self-employed workers (T03547) (T03547) INI0300 INI0300 + FEMM Fond R LULLING Astrid. (PPE) (PE219.531 ) - Consideration of draft report ===] Wednesday, 30 October 1996 (afternoon) 9. Measures to protect minors in the European Union (T03927) (T03927) INI0421 INI0421 + FEMM Avis L DIJK P. (. (V ) (PE218.989 ) F JURI Fond R ZIMMERMANN Wilmya. (PSE) (PE213.154/REV) - Adoption of draft opinion in the form of a letter 10. Petitions Nos 1138/95 presented by Mrs Paula POWER and 1184/95 presented by Mr Peter KILVERT on tampon-related toxic shock syndrome - Exchange of views 11. Public Hearing on AIDS prevention and prostitution to be held in Brussels o n 25 November 1996 - Exchange of views on the framework/issues 12. The European Commission's Annual Work Programme 1997 - Exchange of views ===] Possibly 13. Equal treatment for men and women for access to employment and vocational t raining (amendment of Directive 76/207) (T04841) (T04841) CNS96095 COM(96)0093 C4-0317/96 + FEMM Fond LULLING Astrid. (PPE) - Exchange of views on the opinion of the Committee on Legal Affairs on the lega l base 14. Any other business 15. Date of next meeting in Brussels (PE/XIX/OJ/96-14 ) ****************** A D D E N D U M ******************** 0.1 ===] Wednesday, 30 October 1996 (afternoon) 9.1 European Union and the External Dimension of Human Rights Policy: from Rome to Maastricht and beyond (T04255) (T04255) COS0339 COM(95)0567 C4-0568/95 + FEMM Avis A JOUPPILA Riitta. (PPE) (PE217.389/REV) F POLI Fond R ROUBAaft opinion - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
